request.description: Authenticate the user and returns the user's API token.
Signs out the user and destroy's API token.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with a commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status code: A, C, H, X.
Filter by title. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Creates a new ticket. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.

response.body: {"data":{"type":"ticket","id":1,"attributes":{"title":"cupiditate dolorem qui","description":"Vel nemo pariatur voluptatem consequuntur sit autem et sunt. Nulla non sunt aut ex iusto. Nobis repellendus ut alias non assumenda beatae. request.description: Remove the specified ticket from storage.
Replace the specified ticket in storage.
Update the specified ticket in storage.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by name. Wildcards are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcards are supported.
